Text: Is this better than DVDFab or 1 Click DVD Copy Pro ? Anyone knows ?

Bro !
this is not a video encoder/recoder or video converter,it is just a free but good video player.
cheers ;)

@ jersson: you can't copy DVD with it. You use KMPlayer to play avi, mkv, mp3,... files.
Best player I've seen so far, it's the one I'm using to play all my audio/video files.
